general_advisory: Due to forecast of very light to light rainfall, farmers are advised to postpone application of fertilizer & chemical. Maintain water in the field and survey for any insect pest in kharif crops.

advisory: Due to weather, there is a chance of sheath rot and sheath blight. Manage with Tebuconazole 50%+Trifloxystrobin 25% WG or Propiconazole 25% EC.
Manage Pod borer with Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG, Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC, or Profenophos 50% EC.
Condition is favorable for blast incidence. Manage with Tricyclazole 75% WP.
Go for thinning operation and maintain optimum plant population.
Chances of Aphids in Maize, manage with Dimethoate.
Root rot disease seen, manage with Carbendazim.
Rhizome rot may be seen, apply Tagmycin and Neem oil as curative measures.
Nursery raising and planting of winter vegetables, care & maintenance of Kharif vegetables, and post-harvest technology.
Chances of Downy Mildew disease, manage with Copper Hydroxide 77% WP.
Nursery raising of seasonal and winter flowers, planting of seedlings, grafts & sowing of seeds.
Apply lime to reduce the effect of acidity caused by rainwater.
